channel.title: Linux on Mussell Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Mussell Portfolio

item.title: Linux System Administration Automation: From Manual Tasks to Infrastructure as Code
item.description: Reflections on the journey from manual system administration to fully automated infrastructure. Key principles and patterns for successful automation initiatives.

item.title: eBPF for System Observability: Monitoring Linux Systems at the Kernel Level
item.description: Leveraging eBPF for advanced system observability and monitoring. This project demonstrates how to use eBPF programs to trace system calls, monitor network traffic, and gain deep insights into application behavior without modifying kernel code.
